name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Cao Shunli was born in 1961. She studied at Peking University and obtained a master's degree in law. She worked in the Ministry of Labor and Personnel of the People's Republic of China. She was dismissed from her public office for accusing government agencies of corruption and abuse of power. She has since embarked on the path of rights protection and provided legal assistance to petitioners. On September 14, 2013, she was taken away by Beijing police at Beijing Capital Airport when she was preparing to go to Geneva to participate in the United Nations Human Rights Conference. She died six months later. …

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Follow-up: After the elderly people’s struggle, the fence has been removed and the zebra crossing has been repaved.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 11, in Luoyang, Henan, some owners of unfinished buildings came to the Zhongyuan Bank building to defend their rights and demanded that the bank return their housing payments. A woman took off her top and yelled at the bank to return the money.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of April 10, at Jining Normal University, a naked woman broke into the male dormitory and smashed things, attracting a crowd of onlookers. On the 11th, school staff responded to reporters that the woman was an off-campus person and not a student of the school. The police have now intervened in the investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The driver's behavior has received widespread support from the public in the country.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Rating agency Fitch on Wednesday downgraded China's sovereign credit rating outlook to "negative," citing risks to public finances as the economy faces growing uncertainty in its transition to a new growth model. China's Ministry of Finance expressed regret over the move.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of April 10, at Jining Normal University, a naked woman broke into the male dormitory and smashed things, attracting a crowd of onlookers. On the 11th, school staff responded to reporters that the woman was an outsider and not a student of the school, and the police have intervened in the investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 11, an old man in Miaotou Village, Huangpu District, Guangzhou, tied the Civil Code, the Constitution, and the Communist Party Constitution to his body to protest against the demolition of old buildings.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 11, in Shaxi Village, Panyu, Guangzhou, villagers surrounded a man. According to the villagers, the man had secretly filmed and followed the villagers from behind. The village is also currently undergoing demolition.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/jPTn0TZOvg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the demolition of Baiyuntan Village in Guangzhou has attracted the attention of the whole city. According to local residents, the highest compensation given by the government for demolition is 6,600 yuan per square meter. But it is generally around 3,000 yuan. At present, the housing prices in the surrounding area have exceeded 30,000 yuan. The villagers are in the dilemma of "landlords becoming house slaves".
On April 9, due to dissatisfaction with the demolition compensation plan given by the government, the villagers gathered at the Party and Mass Service Center of Tan Village North Community to defend their rights and seek justice.
On April 10, the Guangzhou Shijing Street Office issued an announcement that Tan Village would suspend demolition and bid for construction on behalf of others.
On April 11, a video released by local residents showed that iron sheets had been built around Tan Village.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of April 10, the school sent a group message saying that the incident involved a social person with schizophrenia and prohibited students from spreading the news.
However, students of the school said that the woman was a student and the incident occurred due to an emotional dispute.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 11, a pedestrian collision and crushing incident occurred near Wangfujing, Xigong District, Luoyang City

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 8, at the launch of the new car of Zhiji, a high-end brand under SAIC, its CEO Liu Tao said that some of his employees missed the birth of their children, some were infected with the new coronavirus four times in a row but still insisted on working, and some employees cruelly sent their young children to boarding schools, which caused an uproar in public opinion.
Netizens complained that this was praising suffering and completely ignoring the labor law. Some netizens even said that after listening to his speech, they felt that if they drove Zhiji cars, they would be exploiting Zhiji employees

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 11, Caixin reported that Xiao Jin, general manager of Jinan Vanke, was taken away by the police during the Qingming Festival and is currently cooperating with the investigation.
On April 10, S&P Global Ratings downgraded Vanke's rating to "junk level". Moody's and Fitch had previously downgraded Vanke's rating to "junk level".
S&P warned that Vanke's sales may continue to decline in the next 12 months due to the continued downturn in China's real estate market.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 10, netizens hotly discussed "Which is higher, auxiliary police or police dogs?"
In response, netizens generally said that police dogs not only have a system but also receive better treatment than auxiliary police. Police dogs will not bully ordinary people who abide by the law.
As of now, the video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 11, Shenzhen, Guangdong. Investors of Ping An Trust came to Shenzhen Ping An Financial Center, but the two sides failed to reach an agreement.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 10, Zhejiang. An e-commerce company posted a video saying that a customer posted a video of strangling a baby and asked for a refund, saying "If you don't refund, I will strangle her to death."
Someone in the comment area said that she encountered a similar situation last year. At that time, she encountered a customer who asked her to ship the goods and said "I want money, I am short of money, if I don't have money, I will strangle her to death, it is she who harmed me"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 11, it was revealed that the Yunnan New Southwest Technical School forced its students to work in the factory to screw screws. They had to work 11 hours a day, and those who did not go would not receive a diploma. The factory paid the school 23 yuan per hour, but the school deducted 9 yuan from it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 11, Xuchang, Henan. Australia-China Real Estate Co., Ltd. owes wages to migrant workers. Workers hold banners outside the Xuchang Municipal Government to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
